pageContext.claim: “I want to get him before Congress and I want to see what he has to say. You know they say he has immunity. Why would you have immunity for outright fraud? Why do you have immunity? Why? He's a fraud.”
pageContext.analysis: The Supreme Court ruled members of Congress have immunity from questioning and prosecution for actions they take while legislating — like conducting committee hearings. Consequently, it seems clear that Schiff's behavior would be protected.
